id: Notion Cover Images & Matching Icon Pack
name: Notion Cover Images & Matching Icon Pack
description: Over 500 Cover Designs in Notion Colors for Light and Dark Mode with Matching Icons and Plain or Dotty BackgroundsEnhance your Notion workspace with cover images designed in Notion’s color schemes for a cohesive look. Each design comes with a matching icon and is available in two styles: plain background and dotty background, in both light and dark modes.What's Included: 16 Headline Covers per Color – Featuring unique words like Planner, Invoices, Home, Dashboards, Journal, University, Habit Tra
features: 16 Headline Covers per Color– Featuring unique words like Planner, Invoices, Home, Dashboards, Journal, University, Habit Tracker, To-Do, Calendar, Finances, and more.; Over 500 Images in Total– Every cover is available in both plain and dotty backgrounds, across light and dark modes, to match your workspace’s aesthetic.; Matching Icons– Each headline comes with a complementary icon (e.g., Home with a house icon, Journal with a book icon) for a consistent, organized design.
